Package application.client

Class ChatClient

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
application.client.ChatClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ChatClient extends AbstractClient
This class overrides some methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.
Version:
July 2000
Author:
Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganiè, François Bélanger

    • ChatClient

      public ChatClient(String host, int port, ChatIF clientUI) throws IOException
      Constructs an instance of the chat client.
      Parameters:
      host - The server to connect to.
      port - The port number to connect on.
      clientUI - The interface type variable.
